channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2025030104
item.description:
Report X-2025030104

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-25
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2025030104 WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO AUDIT STATION, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. 2. X-2025030105 NO COMMENTS PROVIDED.
